org.apache.hadoop.mapred

接口 RecordReader<K,V>

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ComposableRecordReader<K,V>
    所有已知实现类:
    CombineFileRecordReader, CombineFileRecordReaderWrapper, DBInputFormat.DBRecordReader, FixedLengthRecordReader, InnerJoinRecordReader, JoinRecordReader, KeyValueLineRecordReader, LineRecordReader, MultiFilterRecordReader, OuterJoinRecordReader, OverrideRecordReader, SequenceFileAsBinaryInputFormat.SequenceFileAsBinaryRecordReader, SequenceFileAsTextRecordReader, SequenceFileRecordReader, WrappedRecordReader

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface RecordReader<K,V>
    RecordReader reads <key, value> pairs from an InputSplit.

    RecordReader, typically, converts the byte-oriented view of the input, provided by the InputSplit, and presents a record-oriented view for the Mapper & Reducer tasks for processing. It thus assumes the responsibility of processing record boundaries and presenting the tasks with keys and values.

    另请参阅:
    InputSplit, InputFormat

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close this InputSplit to future operations.
      K createKey()
      Create an object of the appropriate type to be used as a key.
      V createValue()
      Create an object of the appropriate type to be used as a value.
      long getPos()
      Returns the current position in the input.
      float getProgress()
      How much of the input has the RecordReader consumed i.e.
      boolean next(K key, V value)
      Reads the next key/value pair from the input for processing.

    • 方法详细资料

      • next

        boolean next(K key,
           V value)
             throws IOException
        Reads the next key/value pair from the input for processing.
        参数:
        key - the key to read data into
        value - the value to read data into
        返回:
        true iff a key/value was read, false if at EOF
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createKey

        K createKey()
        Create an object of the appropriate type to be used as a key.
        返回:
        a new key object.

      • createValue

        V createValue()
        Create an object of the appropriate type to be used as a value.
        返回:
        a new value object.

      • getPos

        long getPos()
            throws IOException
        Returns the current position in the input.
        返回:
        the current position in the input.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Close this InputSplit to future operations.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getProgress

        float getProgress()
                  throws IOException
        How much of the input has the RecordReader consumed i.e. has been processed by?
        返回:
        progress from 0.0 to 1.0.
        抛出:
        IOException
